title: Will a Mayflower restaurant be coming to Wilmington?
text:
Because of the fickle nature of restaurant openings and closings, we
can no longer answer these questions. If we answer yes one day, that
may change in a week. If we find out the answer is no for the current
day, a restaurant may decide otherwise in a few weeks. We can tell you
we cover all new restaurant openings at StarNewsOnline.com and in the
newspaper.
